title: Drawing, "Design for Stained Glass Memorial Window to Thomas J. Post", 1919
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and opaque watercolor on tissue paper, mounted on black paper.
signed: in graphite (?), lower right: R. W. C.; below: R. W. Chanler 1919
description: Vertical rectangle depicting an angel that holds a torch in his right hand, and rests his left hand on a shield bearing the inscription: "THOM. J. POST AT REST AFTER A LONG LIFE OF INDUSTRY THRIFT AND SOBRIETY".

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Stained Glass Memorial Window to Thomas J. Post", 1919.Pen and black ink, brush and opaque watercolor on tissue paper, mounted on black paper.. 1967-63-1.
